infn.bed.item

Class FullSideViewVeto

  • java.lang.Object
    • cnuphys.bCNU.item.AItem
      • cnuphys.bCNU.item.PathBasedItem
        • cnuphys.bCNU.item.PolygonItem
          • cnuphys.bCNU.item.RectangleItem
            • infn.bed.item.FullSideViewVeto
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cnuphys.bCNU.attributes.IAttributeDisplayable, cnuphys.bCNU.drawable.IDrawable, cnuphys.bCNU.feedback.IFeedbackProvider, cnuphys.bCNU.visible.IVisible, java.util.EventListener

    public class FullSideViewVeto
extends cnuphys.bCNU.item.RectangleItem
    This class handles converting charge-time information to energy-time information for vetoes. It then draws rectangles and colors them if they are hit. It displays energy-time information for each veto in the info panel.
    Author:
    Andy Beiter

      • chargeToEnergy

        private void chargeToEnergy()
        Converts the charge-time information to energy-time information. The algorithm is the same as the bars for the top and bottom external vetoes since they have a PMT on each side, but for the other vetoes, we just use the conversion factor because we are mainly just using them as a true/false for hits.

      • inThisVeto

        private boolean inThisVeto(int sector,
                 int intOrExt,
                 int channel)
        Checks if a given sector/intOrExt/channel is this veto
        Parameters:
        sector - Which detector (currently not used)
        intOrExt - 1 if interior, 2 if exterior
        channel - Which interior or exterior veto
        Returns:
        True if the s/ie/c is this veto, false if not
